task.summary:
NPC handing out gift + Created new package NPC and moved NPC class + NPC.0nEncounter now receives Player as attribute. + NPC_Gif class: On the last Sentence the NPC will gift an Item.
* Modified FirstTestMap3x3 for testing NPC_Gift. * Sentences of NPC now displayed in red

Winning Condition + New Interface WinningConditionListener + Game implements WinningConditionListener + New Class Winning Field extends passableField, onEnter calls WinningcConditionListener + Game Quits onWin() * if isRunning os false, after meeting WinningCondition, Map is not showed again. (quite bad solution...)
CodeStyle + Refactoring + Field now has function draw. Map just needs to call this function -> no more instanceof check

Changed Positioning by FieldID to XY_Coordinates + PositionListener Interface + Class XY_Position * Map is now an PositionListener * renamed Function Inventory.InventoryHasInstanceOf() to getIndexOfInstanceOf

MESSAGE.value: Implemented a Dialog option for Class NPC. Adjusted sequence of displaying map and showing Item messages, to solve refreshing problem after NPC dialog.

NPC handing out gift + Created new package NPC and moved NPC class + NPC.0nEncounter now receives Player as attribute. + NPC_Gif class: On the last Sentence the NPC will gift an Item.
* Modified FirstTestMap3x3 for testing NPC_Gift. * Sentences of NPC now displayed in red

Winning Condition + New Interface WinningConditionListener + Game implements WinningConditionListener + New Class Winning Field extends passableField, onEnter calls WinningcConditionListener + Game Quits onWin() * if isRunning os false, after meeting WinningCondition, Map is not showed again. (quite bad solution...)

CodeStyle + Refactoring - stackable(Interface) - HealthPotion and Key do not implement Stackable anymore + StackableItem(AbstractClass) //Every UsableItem is also a StackableItem at the moment * UseableItem extends StackableItem
CodeStyle + Refactoring + Field now has function draw. Map just needs to call this function -> no more instanceof check

Changed Positioning by FieldID to XY_Coordinates + PositionListener Interface + Class XY_Position * Map is now an PositionListener * renamed Function Inventory.InventoryHasInstanceOf() to getIndexOfInstanceOf

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Changed Positioning by FieldID to XY_Coordinates + PositionListener Interface + Class XY_Position * Map is now an PositionListener * renamed Function Inventory.InventoryHasInstanceOf() to getIndexOfInstanceOf
